数据来源：

set.seed(711)
x = seq(0, 4, length = 100)
y = -x + jitter(rep(1:5, each = 20), 2)
z = rep(1:5, each = 20)
par(mar = c(4, 4, 0.1, 0.1))
plot(x, y)
abline(lm(y ~ x), col = "red")
plot(x, y, pch = 20, col = z)
lines(lowess(x, y, f = 0.1), col = "red")
summary(lm(y ~ x))
summary(lm(y ~ x + z))

注意本例中局部平滑函数lowess()函数的应用。
